# rdatasets

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R build status](https://github.com/jolars/rdatasets/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/jolars/rdatasets/actions)
<!-- badges: end -->

A range of datasets for use in R.

## Installation

You can install the package from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("jolars/rdatasets")
```
